casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lawrence SHUE. No. 103P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Lori A. Kroll, Assistant Attorney Generals, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2005 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review and Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
